channel.title: Product on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Product on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: DELETE /admin-api/products/images/{imageId}
item.description: DELETE /admin-api/products/images/{imageId} Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-12324 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/08_product/01_deleteProductsImagesId.ts Steps Step Description Expected result In BO, Go to Advanced Parameters > Authorization Server Authorization Server Page is displayed correctly. No records found in the table Click on the button “Add new API access” New API access Page is displayed correctly * Fill the form with following data * Click on “Generate client secret & Save” button * The message “The API access and Client secret has been generated sucessfully” is displayed

item.title: PATCH /admin-api/products/{productId}/shops
item.description: PATCH /admin-api/products/{productId}/shops Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-11163 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/08_product/05_patchProductsIdShops.ts Steps Step Description Expected result In BO, Go to Advanced Parameters > New & experimental features New & experimental features Page is displayed correctly. Enable the experimental feature “Admin API - Multistore” Click on “Save” Click on “Enable” in the modal The message “Update successful” is displayed. In BO, Go to Advanced Parameters > Authorization Server Authorization Server Page is displayed correctly.
